attributes.review: I see no honest news that is reported , it crashes alot when i click on a report to look through , gave no factual evidence of being considered a working app , i understand it sends notifications an i have them turned on to consider this app good , however the notifications are repeatedly stating the same thing , i advise this app to be removed an maybe fix the bugs , because its not necessarily helping me understand the reasons for voting , because every other known news site states evidence that noone should vote for this , so i list my only vote as remove this app ASAP , an do not regenerate it because it doesnt focus on the truth . Have a blessed day!
attributes.title: fake news

attributes.review: I got this app so that I can learn about politics a little more. When I opened up the app my phone literally exploded. I had to buy a new one and had to get surgery on both my hands. I still had hope for the app but when I opened it the 2nd time all three of my sisters died. This has been a very traumatic experience to go threw. I am warning you, donâ€™t download this app unless you are prepared to lose some (if not all) of your loved ones. A couple weeks later i accidentally opened up the app again when i was trying to play minecraft and as it opened i got hit by a bus. This app is very horrible. 1/5 stars is being generous, it should be -5/5 stars !!!

I even tried to turn off the notifications but it didnâ€™t work. On top of that, this app filled up all of my storage space on my iPhone and I think it even gave it a virus. My phone is so incredibly slow now and because of that I wasnâ€™t able to get my medication alerts on time. Now Iâ€™m in terrible pain and Iâ€™m suffering just because of this bogus app and the man we call our president. Shame on the App Store for continuing to allow this on its page!
